name: VR Carnival (Rick Ko)
description:
Carnival VR is a small VR game set in an apocalyptic carnival setting. Players fling darts at a board before time runs out to obtain prizes.

This was a VR project which was given 10 days to create, with 5 days of which to prototype and concept whilst working from home to fit the brief given.

Rick Ko - UI Programmer, Economy Designer

Blake Lobina - Gameplay Designer

William Tjang - Gameplay Programmer

Emilee Forsyth - Animator

Polina Stegniushina - Prop Artist

Max Phoenix - Prop Artist

Duo Zhang - Environment Artist
